A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I initially dismissed all the cries of "terrible" and angry YouTube rants as "butthurt fanboys".  I was wrong. It really is THAT bad!
I give one and a half for good visuals but story\, character and everything thing that matters deserves zero stars. 

Frankly I'm amazed its scoring 49% with the audience. Judging from most verdicts I'm seeing here it should be more like 20%
